thread.title: Trump's tweet about women just made the internet's head explode
thread.title_full: Trump's tweet about women just made the internet's head explode

author: Keith Wagstaff
title: Trump's tweet about women just made the internet's head explode
text:
No Donald. Just, no.
The president tweeted out a video Thursday about how "only by enlisting the full potential of women in our society will we truly be able to (you have not heard this expression before) make America great again."
Only by enlisting the full potential of women in our society will we be truly able to #MakeAmericaGreatAgain üá∫üá∏ https://t.co/n33fsISWax pic.twitter.com/tcXorZfdea
‚Äî Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) March 31, 2017
SEE ALSO: We totally agree with George W. Bush on Trump's inauguration speech
Hmm, I wonder what people on the internet will think of this message. It's not like Trump was caught on tape saying ... oh yeah.
@realDonaldTrump Don't you mean "GRAB the full potential of women"!?! pic.twitter.com/h9InQRxrvp
‚Äî Kristina Wong ‚ùÑÔ∏è (@mskristinawong) March 31, 2017
Well, it's not like anyone compiled a video of ... welp, there it is.
@realDonaldTrump Here's a 10 minute video that aggregates all of the times you have publicly demeaned, objectified, & insulted women. https://t.co/dBpqTURoku
‚Äî Casey Clemmons (@Casey_Clemmons) March 31, 2017
At least he's always respected women in politics. No?
@realDonaldTrump Not to sound like a broken record but... pic.twitter.com/kiFfkGeg09
‚Äî Allison Piwowarski (@allisonpiwo) March 31, 2017
But, um, at least women are involved in his administration. Oh wait, sorry, I meant the opposite.
@realDonaldTrump . @realDonaldTrump What's the thing they say... a picture says a thousand words? pic.twitter.com/LC0I6CxEFC
‚Äî Al√©x Young‚Äã (@AlexYoung) March 31, 2017
Sometimes, only a GIF can explain what the people are thinking.
@realDonaldTrump pic.twitter.com/D9bEgZVeWw
‚Äî Adam Orth (@adam_orth) March 31, 2017
WATCH: Mick Mulvaney on climate change.
